Hi, yep. This page is totally under construction

Logo redesigns can be painful.

Meetings, revisions, corralling everyone’s input. This can be arduous because you want to do it right for this mark will represent your company or org maybe for decades.

Don’t get me wrong, the long drawn-out process has a place and is here to stay, but it's not for all of us. Logo in-a-week reinvisions the branding process by optimizing for speed while keeping the quality as high as humanly possible.

This service is for those who want a handmade logo—fast. Yes, handmade by an actual human. We promise not to subcontract an AI. And at the end of the week, a customized brand will be sent in all the formats you need.

Features

To do this, we minimize meetings. We will have a kickoff call, but all remaining back-and-forths are through a task management tool. To make use of the short timeline, we offer as many revisions as we can fit in the week.

  • unlimited revisions
  • no meetings -- async communication
  • no arduous process -- keep it simple
  • 100% custom logo not made by a robot

process

  1. Kickoff: our one and only meeting where we discuss the vision and needs
  2. DraftStage one of the
  3. Refine
  4. Deliver

Logos are magic.

They have the power to communicate your values, philosophy, reputation, and what customers can expect by using succinct imagery.

Branding is the whole thing - the combination of messaging and visuals you consistently use. Your logo is the core of your brand.

With this service, it’s up to you to apply and express the logo in ways that resonate with your audience.

In a world where we incessantly research products before buying, first impressions are key. That initial impact matters. Branding is the promise, but it is your responsibility as a business to back it up with action.

Get a tour and Transform Your Design Process Forever

Ready to change the way you source design? Discover how Logo in a Week can elevate your brand. Schedule a guided tour today and see firsthand how we can simplify your logo journey.
